title: The Professional Chef font?
content:
ANyone know this font from “The Professional Chef” book?

[http://www.amazon.com/gp/reader/0471382574/ref=sib\_dp\_pt/002-0101511-4054457#reader-link](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516145359/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/reader/0471382574/ref=sib_dp_pt/002-0101511-4054457#reader-link)

Ive tried what the font and I get close but the “S” and the “f” are hard to find. the f has a wierd cross bar that slopes down on the left side.

Thanks for any help,  
Jeff
author: Carbon71
